page.title: 04Hatfield Complete ? (cont.)
page.content: new crematorium, the other is Hatfield Football Club and ground.There is likely to be considerable controversy if further attempts are made to encroach onto the Green Belt. {Millwards -a young resident's view.} Millwards is a housing estate in South Hatfield.The houses are all new and behind them is a recreation ground.It has a slide, a swing,a climbing frame and big cement pipes to play in. Along side is a big field where you can play football,cricket or golf. On the far side there is a zig-zag path and in winter when the snow is on the ground it gets really glassy.We go down it on plastic bags.At the bottom there is a ditch and you can go whizzing round it a few times.
